briefdescription.para: All AudacityProject functions that provide the menus. Implements AudacityProjectCommandFunctor.

detaileddescription.para: This file implements the method that creates the menu bar, plus all of the methods that get called when you select an item from a menu.
All of the menu bar handling is part of the class AudacityProject, but the event handlers for all of the menu items have been moved to Menus.h and Menus.cpp for clarity.
